column4: i love Feisty Fawn.  im convinced i want to upgrade my stable Edgy to it even thuogh it's beta :O

does feisty break like every day or is it reasonably good with the updates?  im not worried about my data as i backup regularly.  only reason i want feisty on here is because it works stock (neither dapper nor edgy will properly install with my motherboard)
it might run, but it would still be beta, so expect crashes and bugs here and there
it's really no problem.  i don't think there's ever been a linux problem i couldn't fix ;P
